title: Brick ABC: An Alphabet Book Illustrated with LEGO Bricks
description: This book motivates little LEGO® fans to learn their ABC’s by matching the words with the LEGO® objects. The ABC letters and a scene for each letter in this book are built with LEGO® bricks in a simple and fun way. Words and short descriptions are given for each scene. Parents can also read to their children and ask them to point at the pictures to find the objects.
author: Brick Pals
